name: Tower Walker: MMO Grind Simulator
description:
From the developers of Dino Nest and Boxing School comes a new fresh auto-grinder, idler fantasy RPG game rich with features. Create and manage your own hero. Explore the huge ancient tower. This is a pure offline singleplayer MMO Grind Simulator!

THE DARK MYSTERIOUS TOWER


Many years ago, a scribe working in the royal library found an old scroll hidden away inside the wall. It had the markings of an elder warlock from the council of the scepter order. The scroll pointed the way to the location of a huge abandoned ancient tower somewhere in the lands of the north. It was written that the tower itself is a living being, an evil place that has been alive for thousands of years built by the eternal master to keep watch over the lands. King Belmont, the ruler of these lands sent many expeditions to explore this legend, but none of them survived...

CREATE YOUR CHARACTER

KEY FEATURES

  • Create and manage your hero, choose between 3 starter classes
  • Progress up in the ancient tower, explore and discover
  • Defeat powerful bosses and gain infamy with enemy factions
  • Loot weapons, armor, rings, artifacts and other powerful items
  • Level up your character and learn new skills at the trainer
  • Over 20 classes and 5 expertise grades for weapons and armor
  • Trade with merchants in the basecamp or unlock secret vendors
  • Craft items, fully featured recipe based crafting system
  • Find and level up companions with extra buffs and combat abilities
  • Complete normal or heroic quests in the journal to reveal lore
  • Enchant your weapons, armor and rings (old school style) with no limits
  • Shared stash transfer capability in inventory storage
  • Offline Singleplayer with up to 8 character save slots
Your journey in Tower Walker always continues through new expansions
(Upcoming: Abyss Realm - the first raid instance, normal and hard mode)

OFFLINE SINGLEPLAYER ONLY

Tower Walker does not contain any online features, multiplayer or microtransactions. This is a pure oldschool offline singleplayer experience with local savefiles only.
